keyword: calories in mcdonalds ice cream cone
title: Calories in McDonald's Ice Cream Cone
meta_description: Discover calories in McDonald's ice cream cone: about 200 kcal per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in McDonald's Ice Cream Cone
assumptions: Standard vanilla reduced fat ice cream cone from McDonald's; includes cone wafer and soft serve ice cream.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's vanilla ice cream cone contains about 200 calories with 34g carbs and 5g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 calories for the standard vanilla cone.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: About 34g total carbs, including 27g sugars and 0g fiber.

faqs.q: Is the McDonald's ice cream cone high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 5g total fat, with 3g saturated; considered moderate.

faqs.q: How much protein in McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: Roughly 5g protein per cone from the dairy.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's ice cream cone have trans fats?
faqs.a: 0g trans fat, but check for updates as formulations can change.
